attributes.action: change organ donation from opt in to opt out
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Change organ donation from opt in to opt out so people are automatically on the donor list at age 18 unless they carry a card, or register on the organ donor database, that after their death they don't wish to be an organ donor

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "change organ donation from opt in to opt out."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14147.asp

Prime Minister's Office
